meanings.definition: The quality or state of being heinous.
meanings.sent1: The heinousnesses of the crime shocked the entire community.
meanings.sent2: The heinousnesses of the villain's actions were evident in every detail.
meanings.sent3: The heinousnesses of the situation made everyone gasp in disbelief.
meanings.sent4: The heinousnesses of the betrayal cut deep into her trust.
meanings.sent5: The heinousnesses of the crime stained the town's reputation forever.

meanings.definition: The extreme wickedness or evilness of an act.
meanings.sent1: The heinousnesses of the deed left a lasting scar on the victim.
meanings.sent2: The heinousnesses of the crime were beyond comprehension.
meanings.sent3: The heinousnesses of the prank made everyone laugh uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: The heinousnesses of the lie spread like wildfire through the town.
meanings.sent5: The heinousnesses of the betrayal lingered in the air like a foul stench.
